thoughts.text: Now that I have created the new directory, I can list the files in the parent directory to see if it was created successfully.
thoughts.reasoning: I just created a new directory and I want to see if it was created successfully.
thoughts.plan: - List the files in the parent directory
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that the new directory is listed and that it is in the correct location.
thoughts.speak: I will now list the files in the parent directory to see if the new directory was created successfully.
